attributes.action: help these innocents get real justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mother and daughter evicted from council home with no asbos or police evidence issued, despite never having been convicted of a crime and yet found totally innocent. son subjected to at least five attempts on life. is this what real european union justice is? call for immediate withdrawal from eu and return to british justice!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
